name: mpromise
description: A Promises/A+ implement. Read https://promisesaplus.com/ for more.
author: zendo <zendo@example.com>

scripts.prebuild: npm run lint && npm run unit:test
scripts.build: npm run build:default && npm run build:extend && npm run build:gzip
scripts.build:default: cross-env NODE_ENV=production_base parcel build src/index.js --global Promise
scripts.build:extend: cross-env NODE_ENV=production_extend parcel build src/extend.js --global Promise
scripts.test: npm run unit:test && npm run aplus:test
scripts.aplus:test: cross-env IMPL=base && npm run compile:cjs && node es5/test/aplus_test.js
scripts.unit:test: npm run unit:test:base && npm run unit:test:extend
